label: URL
description: The url for your site, e.g.: https://respondcms.com

label: Icon
description: The favicon used for the site

label: Color
description: The color used as the Android application color

label: reCAPTCHA Site Key
description: The site key provided at https://www.google.com/recaptcha/

label: reCAPTCHA Secret Key
description: The secret key provided at https://www.google.com/recaptcha/
